title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, August 14, 2021
description: It's the birthday of blockbuster best-selling romance novelist Danielle Steel (1947), who has written 185 books, 141 of which are novels.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of blockbuster best-selling romance novelist Danielle Steel (1947), who has written 185 books, 141 of which are novels.
